choices: Nothing sexual yet just a bath and he so flustered he miss things like horns
Bath time get more then a little steamy with little bit of fun
They don't make it Tammy need to be milk right now.
John ex is knocking on the door yelling to let her in.
12.content:
After a massive Hollywood likely inspired film escape, that would not be justice to just write down. That and John is pretty sure that half the explosion where not just in his head. They where safe hidden in his house, john look around hoping that his family was out still. He found a note.
Dear My sweet john.

The family just won a free week long vacation. But since it was the last minute and ending soon we pack and left with out telling you. Don't worrying we have food in the fridge and you have the bank card to buy something if you need to. We call soon as we are all settled in. Don't burn down the house.
Love
Mom.

Well at lest I don't have to worry about them john thought as he look at his kinda guest.
She was kinda dirty and her clothes didn't look like they fit her to well.
"Would you like to take a bath?" He ask her as she stop looking around when he ask her.

"If-if it not a problem, but I kinda am little sore so could you help me g-get undress and washed." She said blushing hard trying to hide her face.

"N-no problem I be happy to." Now Hohn was blushing as he help her walk to the bathroom.

Now what going to happen?
12.title: After John saved Tammy?

14.title: readers choice

info.brief_description: John was an average guy, until he met a miracle of nature, a literal Cow-girl
info.description:
John had always been an average joe, but a chance encounter with a girl genetically fused with cow DNA changes that.

One day as he was walking he had seen a farm he had seen a girl being chased by 2 men. After telling her to come with him and hide she starts to fall in love with him for saving her, though it might be more than he asked for.

You can have romance, but try not to go too detailed into it if you no what i mean.

No dying or killing off anyone.

Characters:

John: 16 years old, a fair person who enjoys playing video games watching TV. His life is mostly average, but his personality is not, for he will help anyone in need.

Tammy: 15 years old. A half cow, half human hybrid. She appears as a normal human girl, if you ignore the cow ears, horns and udder. She's fairly chubby however because of her cow DNA. She falls in love with John and urge to share her milk with him. She loves the feeling of being milked also.

Amy: 15 years old: John's ex-girlfriend. She grows a bit jealous of Tammy, and Tammy doesn't like her either.

Also please be descriptive unless your giving a branch option.

So have fun.
